components.name: AboutComponent
components.templateData:
About PseudoWrite

Welcome to PseudoWrite, where your writing journey is assisted by cutting-edge AI technology...

Our AI-driven features provide personalized suggestions, plot development ideas...

Whether you're a seasoned author or just starting, PseudoWrite is here to support your creative journey...

components.name: BookCollectionComponent

Your Books
@if(books.length != 0){

} @else{

components.name: ButtonComponent
components.templateData:
<button [class]="'text-md px-6 py-2 bg-button text-primary rounded-lg shadow hover:bg-button-hover hover:text-primary-hover active:bg-button-active active:text-primary-active focus:outline-none transition ease-in-out duration-300' + twClasses" [transferAttributes]="otherAttrs" >
  <ng-content></ng-content>
</button>

components.name: SkeletonComponent
TextEditorComponent
components.templateData:
<angular-editor id="editor" [(ngModel)]="htmlContent" [config]="editorConfig">
<ng-template #customButtons let-executeCommandFn="executeCommandFn">
    <ae-toolbar-set>
      <app-button  title="Angular editor logo" (click)="saveContent()">
        Save
      </app-button>
    </ae-toolbar-set>
  </ng-template>
</angular-editor>

WritingWorkspaceComponent

variables.name: appConfig
editorConfig
variables.defaultValue:
{
  editable: true,
  spellcheck: true,
  height: 'calc(100vh - 100px)',
  minHeight: '0',
  maxHeight: 'auto',
  width: 'auto',
  minWidth: '0',
  translate: 'yes',
  enableToolbar: true,
  showToolbar: true,
  placeholder: 'Write Chapter Here...',
  defaultFontName: 'roboto',
  fonts: [
    { class: 'times-new-roman', name: 'Times New Roman' },
    { class: 'merriweather', name: 'Merriweather' },
    { class: 'roboto', name: 'Roboto' },
    { class: 'arial', name: 'Arial' },
    { class: 'lora', name: 'Lora' },
  ],
  sanitize: true,
  toolbarPosition: 'top',
  toolbarHiddenButtons: toolbarHiddenButtons,
}
